order.subject: Director Nominee for IPR Committee
order.body: Based on the approval of the Competent Authority, Dr. Tamasi Moyra Panua, Associate Professor, Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering, NIT Agaratala is hereby nominated as Director Nominee for Intellectual Property Right (IPR) Committee till Deccember, 2025.

nominee.name: Dr. Tamasi Moyra Panua
nominee.newRole: Director Nominee for Intellectual Property Right (IPR) Committee

distributionList: P.S. to Director for kind information of the Director, NITA.
The Dean (R&C), Chairman, IPR, Standing Committee (IPR SC), NITA for kind information.
All Deans/HoDs, NITA for kind information.
All the members of Core Committee, IPR, NITA for kind information.
The Chairman, Computing & ICT Unit, NITA for arranging uploading of the same in the Institute's website.
